useCase.name: Manage Company Departments
useCase.description: As a user, I want to manage the departments and employees within a company.

preconditions.precondition: The system is running and accessible.

successEndConditions.condition: The company's departments and employees are successfully created and managed.

failureEndConditions.condition: An error occurred while creating or managing the company's departments and employees.

useCase.trigger: User initiates the process by running the main program.

mainSequence.step: Main calls the method to run departments.
HR adds Employee1 to the department.
